pullRequest.title: [resolves #3388] Provide docker image on openjdk15 to support arm64
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Fixed Issue(s)


Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message: [resolves #3388] Provide docker image on openjdk15 to support arm64

nodes.bodyText:
With Teku we need to build the docker images as the develop version rather than the project version (Besu does it differently because of some historical differences in CI setup and it just never changed back).

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              def dockerBuildVersion = rootProject.version
          
          
            
              def dockerBuildVersion = 'develop'

commit.message: Build docker images as develop version.
